name: Board Game Barrage
description:
Various classic board game characters are on their way to battle Monopoly Man in this short bullet hell created for GameJam 2022! Will you roll the dice and bet on chance to take him down?

Submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2022

How to play: https://tinyurl.com/2sjkktz9

Note: Due to the website going down, we were unable to patch the game with an updated version.
